dragons.name: Smaug
quotes: I am fire. I am death.
You have nice little devices here, little people.

features.name: Fire Breath
features.description: Smaug can breathe fire, a powerful and destructive ability.

features.name: Thick Scales
features.description: His scales are incredibly tough, providing strong protection.

dragons.background_story: Smaug is a fearsome dragon who claimed the Lonely Mountain and its treasure for himself. His greed and destruction led to the fall of Erebor and a long-standing conflict with the dwarves.

appearance.description: Smaug is a massive dragon with red-golden scales and a fearsome appearance. His eyes are described as fiery and penetrating.

dragons.name: Glaurung
quotes: I am Glaurung, the Father of Dragons.

features.name: Mind Control
features.description: Glaurung could manipulate the minds of others and spread terror.

features.name: Fire Breath
features.description: Glaurung could breathe fire, though not as powerful as Smaug.

dragons.background_story: Glaurung was the first of the dragons created by Morgoth. He was known for his powerful ability to corrupt and control others, spreading terror throughout Beleriand.

appearance.description: Glaurung had a serpentine body covered in gold and black scales. His eyes were filled with malevolent intelligence.

dragons.name: Ancalagon the Black
quotes: I will bring ruin to the world.

features.name: Immense Size
features.description: Ancalagon was the largest and most powerful of all dragons.

features.name: Fire Breath
features.description: Ancalagonâ€™s fire breath was devastatingly powerful.

dragons.background_story: Ancalagon was the greatest of Morgoth's dragons, known for his immense size and strength. He was a key figure in the final battles of the First Age, causing widespread destruction.

appearance.description: Ancalagon was a colossal dragon with black scales and a formidable presence. His size and power made him a terror in battle.

dragons.name: Scatha
quotes: Fools who come to challenge me shall die.
My treasure is beyond your reach.

features.name: Fire Breath
features.description: Scatha could breathe fire, though not as powerful as Smaug or Ancalagon.

features.name: Sharp Talons
features.description: Scatha's talons were razor-sharp, capable of slicing through armor.

dragons.background_story: Scatha was a dragon that terrorized the northern regions of Middle-earth, particularly Eriador. He hoarded great treasures and was feared by many.

appearance.description: Scatha was a dragon with dark scales and sharp talons. His appearance was fearsome, with a menacing gaze and a powerful build.
